content: *** the santa s workshop blanket cal starts on **wednesday 8th october 2025** when the first part of the pattern will be released further parts of the pattern will be released over the following six weeks *** make the holidays extra special this year and join catherine crochets sirdar and thousands of crocheters from all over the world for a 6-week crochet-along cal with a free written pattern and weekly video tutorials we ll guide you every step of the way to create your very own santa s workshop blanket complete with a nice list train presents toys and a host of festive decorations all created with a variety of fun stitches and techniques this is a cal you won t want to miss the cal officially starts on wednesday 8th october and runs for six weeks each week a new section of the pattern will be released making it really easy and enjoyable to follow along but don t worry if life gets busy it s absolutely fine to take longer than six weeks to complete your blanket and you can start and join in at any time the written pattern is completely free and you can download the sections for free from sirdar s website here https //sirdar com/santas-workshop-christmas-crochet-along alongside the pattern there will be detailed video tutorials to guide you through every stitch and technique so whether you re new to crochet or a seasoned pro there s something for everyone there s an official yarn kit available that includes all the yarn you ll need for the blanket plus a few special cal extras too however if you prefer to use your own yarn stash that s absolutely fine too you can purchase the kit via this link https //tidd ly/48kmfdk for more details about the cal and tips to help you with each week visit my website here https //catherinecrochets com/santas-workshop-cal/ sign up to my email list and receive two free patterns a monthly newsletter and the biggest discounts on my patterns https //catherinecrochets com/join/
